original_request.original: We believe quality journalism should be available to everyone, paid for by those who can afford it.Your support makes all the difference.Read more · The mother of a London lawyer who died after drinking contaminated vodka while travelling in Laos has recalled her “horrendous” journey to be at her daughter’s bedside.
